fr.umlv.wallj.display

Interface Displayable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Board, Bomb, Empty, Explosion, Garbage, Path, Player, Trashcan, Wall

    public interface Displayable
    A Displayable object is an object that can be represented in a Zen5 graphic window. It must implements the draw methode, which allows it to be drawn.
    Author:
    Severin Gosset - Denis Biguenet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
      Draws an object in the given graphic context.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
        Draws an object in the given graphic context.
        Parameters:
        graphics - the graphic in which the Displayable must be drawn.
